div.div: Regional change in greenfinch occurrence in gardens in response to trichomonosis.
div.p: Mean reporting rate from GBW of greenfinch, chaffinch and dunnock in spring 2005/06 (filled bars) and 2007 (open bars) in areas of Low, Intermediate and High incidence of trichomonosis incidence (see Fig. 3). Bars represent 95% confidence limits.
